response: narrative=Sarah Field was last seen at a roadhouse located on 16 Cleghorn Street, Dundee, where she met briefly with her aunt for an early breakfast. Described as a reliable and communicative individual, her sudden disappearance raised concerns when she failed to attend a family gathering planned later that evening. Family members, including her uncle William Field, reported her missing when attempts to contact her went unanswered. Investigators focused on the last confirmed sighting at the roadhouse and traced her travel history through the area. The search expanded to include nearby locales such as the restaurant on 19 Dalgleish Street, Tayport, but initially yielded no leads.
